definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Golem Is Awakening!</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GolemsAwakening</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">40</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="spawn_entity_with_rotation"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:GolemBoss</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="yaw"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
